product_name: Mountainsmith Reflex Camera Bag - Medium - Special Buy
long_description: The Mountainsmith Reflex camera bag secures your expensive DSLR camera in a soft cocoon and keeps it easily accessible so you won't miss a shot. Includes zippered access to the camera compartment; interior is padded and has dividers to keep your gear protected and organized. Cover flap includes an accessories pocket for keeping memory cards and spare batteries easily accessible; side mesh pockets provide additional storage. Carry the Mountainsmith Reflex camera bag with the convenient adjustable shoulder strap; also includes a top carry handle. Special buy.
short_description: The Mountainsmith Reflex camera bag secures your expensive DSLR camera in a soft cocoon and keeps it easily accessible so you won't miss a shot.
